organizations.name: min read   valeant pharmaceuticals international inc

text: 26 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Valeant To Purchase Up To $1.5 Bln Aggregate Principal Of Outstanding Notes​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc: * VALEANT AND ONE OF ITS SUBSIDIARIES ANNOUNCE EARLY TENDER RESULTS AND EARLY SETTLEMENT DATE FOR CASH TENDER OFFERS FOR SENIOR NOTES * VALEANT - ‍CO, UNITS TO PURCHASE UP TO $1.5 BILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL OF OUTSTANDING NOTES​ * VALEANT - ‍VALEANT IS OFFEROR FOR NOTES ISSUED BY IT, AND VPI IS OFFEROR FOR NOTES ISSUED BY IT​ * VALEANT - ‍TOTAL CONSIDERATION INCLUDES EARLY TENDER PREMIUM OF $30 PER $1,000 PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF NOTES ACCEPTED FOR PURCHASE AS OF EARLY TENDER DATE​ * VALEANT - ‍TENDER OFFERS REMAIN OPEN AND WILL EXPIRE AT 11:59 P.M., NEW YORK CITY TIME, ON APRIL 9, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
